column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My main "issue" is that there is just sooooooo much European art. I wish they had larger sections on art around the world. The American folk art section was tiny. Sure there are large rooms of some different cultures but then there are rooms and rooms and rooms of old art made by white European males. I just don't find this art super interesting
column2: I like seeing the different kind of art made by different people all around the world
column3: as much as the "famous" stuff. I know this is probably an unpopular opinion
column4: but that's why I gave this a 4 out of 5.
